title: UFYB 247: The Inherent Brain Error Everyone Makes
itunes:title: The Inherent Brain Error Everyone Makes
description:
A lot of people want to become entrepreneurs to enjoy the freedom that comes with being able to call your own shots. But at the first hint of any of entrepreneurship’s hallmark instability, they usually take it to mean they’re doing it wrong. This inherent brain error of only fantasizing about the positive and rejecting the negative is one I see play out time and time again in all facets of life.

 

Listen to this week’s podcast episode to learn about the inherent brain error and how it can hold you back, and the incredible difference it can make when you accept the full experience of whatever you choose.

 

Get full show notes and more information here: https://unfuckyourbrain.com/247
